entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 6:17 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:17 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
